data.title: SFP-NOW Featuring Actor Raphael Sbarge
data.meta_description: In this episode of SFP-NOW I chat to actor Raphael Sbarge who can be seen weekly in the hit ABC drama 'Once Upon A Time' in which he plays the duel role of Archie Hopper / Jiminy Cricket. During the interview we discuss Raphael's early acting career on Sesame Street as well as his insperation behind the role of Jiminy Cricket and how he has tried to bring something different to the role that what we have seen before. Plus we also feature a second chance for you to hear my recent interview with screenwriter Ron Shusett, who is known for his work on such films as 'Alien', 'Total Recall' and Minority Report'. So if you're a fan of Once Upon A Time don't miss this episode of SFP-NOW.
data.text:
In this episode of SFP-NOW I chat to actor Raphael Sbarge who can be seen weekly in the hit ABC drama 'Once Upon A Time' in which he plays the duel role of Archie Hopper / Jiminy Cricket.

During the interview we discuss Raphael's early acting career on Sesame Street as well as his insperation behind the role of Jiminy Cricket and how he has tried to bring something different to the role that what we have seen before.

Plus we also feature a second chance for you to hear my recent interview with screenwriter Ron Shusett, who is known for his work on such films as 'Alien', 'Total Recall' and Minority Report'.

So if you're a fan of Once Upon A Time don't miss this episode of SFP-NOW.
